file_content.text: Can't get enough of us, huh? Wish I could chat, but I've got parties to plan.
If you're looking for dancers for a private party, they're booking up fast.
I'm here to see a friend of mine. Ria Deleru?
Is Ria here?
Oh, she just got in. Doesn't even have her costume on yet. Ria! Someone to see you!
Thank you for considering Hanera's Dance Troupe for your entertainment needs. How may I please you this day?
Nik's worried about you. He asked me to get you out of here.
Your mate sent me.
Blast it. I should've known.
I'll set you free.
What? Did Nik talk to you? Blast it! I knew he'd try something like this.
What does someone like you see in a loser like Nik?
Your mate doesn't deserve you.
Oh, please don't tell me he sent you. Should've known he'd try something like this.
I'm afraid you've wasted your time. I'm not here "against my will."
It's okay, you can talk to me.
Please explain?
Nik said you were brought here by the guild.
Weren't you kidnapped?
Well, yes--I mean, I was initially. But it ended up being the best thing that could've happened.
Huh?
I'm sorry, I should've told Nik the truth. I was just hoping to spare his feelings.
Life with him was miserable. Not only were we barely scraping by, but I was fed up.
His jealousy was driving me crazy! He didn't want me talking to anyone or going out. Life here is... better.
Your mate probably needs to hear this.
You should tell Nik.
I know. I should've realized he would never just let me go.
You're really saying you'd rather be a dancer?
You prefer it here?
Oh my stars, yes! Hanera says she's never seen someone with as much potential as me. I can really make something of myself.
Why does none of this surprise me?
Figures.
Nik and I left the homeworld together. His devotion was flattering... but I grew to realize the difference between love and obsession.
Could you please tell Nik I was shipped off Coruscant? If he thinks I'm gone, he might move on.
Stay here. Your secret's safe with me.
If that's what you want.
Thank you! I appreciate your help. Nik's not evil, but I just... couldn't stay.
Thank you! I appreciate your help. I hope you'll come back and see me under less... formal circumstances.
You'll go back to Nik one way or another.
I'm sending you back.
You'd really make me, wouldn't you? You should be an enforcer for the guild!
I'll go back to him. I just... let me get my things. I'm going.
If you're looking for dancers for a private party, we're all booked up. Check back with us later.
I hear you have one of those fish women with the hair....
Looking for a tentacled creep.
Yeah, I know the one you're talking about. Hey, Ria! Someone here to see you!
Let's see... anyone start working just recently?
Any new girls?
Matter of fact, yeah. Hey, Ria! Someone here to see you!
